rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Honestly, I'd be so much happier if I was
helping to fix up the Ares...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0020
rows.name: But they told me to get out of their way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0030
rows.name: They were all like, "You just stick to your BLADE duties!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0040
rows.name: How RUDE is that?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Like dude, I was even on the original
Ares maintenance team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: xs31150100_SEL0010
rows.name: Ask if she knew Al.

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0060
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0070
rows.name: The first time we met,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0080
rows.name:
it would've been about when I first got
assigned to Elma's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_JNK0020
rows.name: Commiserate

rows.label: xs31150100_SEL0020
rows.name:
Protest that she's the best mechanic
in the universe.

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0090
rows.name: Thanks for the vote of confidence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0100
rows.name: Kind of you to say![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0110
rows.name: You know, the first time I met Al,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0120
rows.name: it was around the time I got assigned to Elma's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0130
rows.name:
You've seen what he's like...
The others never really got his humor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0140
rows.name: So he was often all alone, like it or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0150
rows.name: But I liked him. He was always kind to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0160
rows.name: Maybe it's because...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0170
rows.name: he had a younger sister about the same age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0180
rows.name:
They got separated trying to flee their country.
Seems it got pretty rough there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0190
rows.name: He hadn't seen her since then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0200
rows.name: Al always said that people need a place to belong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0210
rows.name: Not like, a location...or some specific address or whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0220
rows.name: It's more, somewhere you'd keep coming back to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0230
rows.name: Somewhere people liked and trusted you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0240
rows.name: He used to talk about it a lot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0250
rows.name: I think...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0260
rows.name:
the place his sister and family wereâ€”
that's where he felt needed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0270
rows.name: But then it was taken from him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0280
rows.name:
After that, he decided all of Earth needed him,
and took to the stars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0290
rows.name:
The belief his family was alive and well
somewhere down there...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0300
rows.name:
That's what made him decide Earth
was worth giving anything to protect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0310
rows.name: After we lost Earth,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0320
rows.name: the White Whale became Al's home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0330
rows.name:
"So ya see, Lin, that's what makes you
part of my big, fat, happy family!" Heh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0340
rows.name: That's how he put it to me, once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0350
rows.name: Hearing that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0360
rows.name: I'd never felt so happy in my whole life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0370
rows.name: Now...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0380
rows.name: Now I can't do it anymore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0390
rows.name: I can't just blindly trust Al's kind words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0400
rows.name: Too much has happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0410
rows.name: We've been through too much since then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_JNK0030
rows.name: Support

rows.label: xs31150100_SEL0030
rows.name: Tell her she needs to give herself time.

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0420
rows.name: ...You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0430
rows.name:
I might've been getting a little too up in
my own head there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0440
rows.name: It'll take time to sort this out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_JNK0040
rows.name: Put at Ease

rows.label: xs31150100_SEL0040
rows.name: Tell her to just go with her gut.

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0450
rows.name: ...You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0460
rows.name: I'm probably overthinking it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0470
rows.name: I don't need all the answers straight away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0480
rows.name: Thanks for letting me ramble. I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31150100_MSG0490
rows.name: I feel better, getting that off my chest.[ST:wait ]
